dialogue.text: Look, Ghost! My new creation, another child, your Sister. Meet Love.
I realised what I did wrong when I made you... so I decided to give it another try and look, I fixed it!
Hello! It's so wonderful to meet you!
Isn't she perfect? Filled with love, just as intended. Come, Love, you will help me make the people of Vaporia.
Yes, Mother! Oh, Ghost, would you like some love too?
No, I'm good. It is good to meet you. I must go though...
Don't wander too far, Ghost. Stay where I can see you.
